post:
Hello!

We have just released four long-awaited updates of WHMCS modules that should interest you.

**IP Manager For WHMCS 1.8** - [**module page**](http://www.modulesgarden.com/products/whmcs/ip_manager/features) - [**changelog**](http://www.modulesgarden.com/products/whmcs/ip_manager/changelog)


**SolusVM Extended VPS For WHMCS 1.4** - [**module page**](http://www.modulesgarden.com/products/whmcs/solusvm_extended_vps/features) - [**changelog**](http://www.modulesgarden.com/products/whmcs/solusvm_extended_modules/changelog)

**SolusVM Extended Cloud For WHMCS 1.4** - [**module page**](http://www.modulesgarden.com/products/whmcs/solusvm_extended_cloud/features) - [**changelog**](http://www.modulesgarden.com/products/whmcs/solusvm_extended_modules/changelog)

**SolusVM Extended Reseller For WHMCS 1.3** - [**module page**](http://www.modulesgarden.com/products/whmcs/solusvm_extended_reseller/features) - [**changelog**](http://www.modulesgarden.com/products/whmcs/solusvm_extended_modules/changelog)

Next release will take place in 2015.

**We wish you a merry Christmas!**

ModulesGarden Team
